title: A Young Wife's Witchcraft
overview: Angel dumped Roy to marry Uncle Burhan, who had been her sugar daddy. As soon as she officially became a young wife, Angel was even attracted to her husband's nephew named Leo. He also uses the services of a shaman named Sumi so that Leo wants to sleep with him. Vivian, the old wife, apparently found out about Angel's actions, so her plans fell apart. Angel also asks Sumi to torture Vivian through witchcraft.
